Html:
Reading the documentation and it says the following:

"Once the certificate have been generate, click on the « Save the certificate » button
to record the file onto the disk. (You will need it in the next step)."

Once I generate the certificate I can't click the "Save the certificate" button. It's grayed out.
Is the option still greyed out after you press the Connect/Reload button, or reconnect to the server by closing and opening WPP again?
